overview: Spencer knows graduating is no easy task and writing an acceptance speech isn't either. But doing this and also having to find a house, interacting with not very nice people, deciding on a career and dealing with the intricacies of love whilst daydreaming all the time sounds impossible to her.  Will she be able to overcome the overwhelmingness of graduating? Or will the struggles of early adulthood get the best of her?
title: Not Very Nice
